text: Lloyd Henry Gaston (2 December 1929 â€“ 24 September 2006) was a theologan, biblical scholar, associate professor, and professor emeritus of New Testament at Vancouver School of Theology. He also was a president of the Canadian Society of Biblical Studies and Pastor of First Presbyterian Church (Edmonton). == Life == Gaston was born in Morgantown, West Virginia. == Works == * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2006 deaths Category:People from Morgantown, West Virginia Category:American theologians Category:American academics Category:Writers from West Virginia
title: Lloyd Gaston
